channel.title: License on Rory's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in License on Rory's Blog

item.title: How to add License at eXR platform
item.description: Currently we have two ways to install the license.One is “Traditional Licensing” and the other is “Smart Software Licensing”.But at Cisco eXR platform(64-bit IOS XR), we can only use “Smart Software Licensing”.
